sentences.sContent: We are sitting by the campfire.
The black soot deposited on a kettle by a smoky campfire is nearly pure carbon.
sentences.sContent_eng: The black soot deposited on a kettle by a smoky campfire is nearly pure carbon.
sentences.sCn: 带烟的营火在水壶上熏积的黑煤烟几乎是纯碳。

sentences.sContent: A group of elderly men in uniforms, eyes bright with reminiscence, are gathered at a Grand Army of the Republic campfire.
sentences.sContent_eng: A group of elderly men in uniforms, eyes bright with reminiscence, are gathered at a Grand Army of the Republic campfire.
sentences.sCn: 一群上年纪穿着制服的退伍老兵，围在伟大共和国军的营火旁边，眼神明亮地回忆着过去的光辉岁月。

remMethod.val: camp(露营， 宿营) + fire(火) → 营火

trans.tranOther: a fire made outdoors by people who are camping
